We Help Burn Injury Victims Recover Compensation

If you suffered severe burns due to another party’s fault, the path to rebuilding your life may be a long one including skin grafts, surgeries and seemingly endless doctor visits.

Although the incident can’t be undone, you could be entitled to compensation, a crucial component to your recovery.

Decades Of Experience, AV Preeminent-Rated Lawyers

At Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, LLC, our Columbus attorneys have more than 100 years of combined experience helping those who have suffered burns and other catastrophic injuries recover the full compensation they need and deserve.

Founding partner William W. Lamkin has become a well-known personal injury attorney in central Ohio and attorneys Timothy L. Van Eman and Thomas W. Trimble have both received AV Preeminent* ratings from Martindale-Hubbell.

We have the skill, experience and reputation to handle cases that have resulted in extensive burns and deaths from:

  • House fires caused by defective smoke alarms
  • Workplace fires caused by hazardous conditions and the use of toxic substances
  • Hospital fires caused by dangerous surgical equipment

Let Our Attorneys Help You

If you or a loved one has suffered a serious burn injury, you need to know that your attorneys will give you the best chance of securing the full compensation you deserve.

Call 614-360-2706 or send an email. We collect attorneys’ fees only if we recover compensation for you.

We will work to ensure that you have what you need to recover as much as possible so you can keep moving forward with your life.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review Ratings™ fall into two categories — legal ability and general ethical standards.
